reviewText:
This is the "Donna" DVD repackaged.

This appears to be the trend with Universal. Same product, same running order, no remastering or improvement of sound, just a bright new package with the "previously released" notice in very small print hidden somewhere on the back of the package.

I don't blame the artist. This DVD has some great rare clips and is a must for any fan of 10cc ONLY if you don't have the "Donna" DVD.

Now if they would only compile all the Godley & Creme videos (including "Mondo Video") in one collection I could die happy.
